page.title: 09LEISURE IN SCREDINGTON.
page.content: According to a survey which we have carried out a lot of people like outdoor hobbies.Fishing seems to be one of the popular ones and we can catch pike perch and roach nearby and dace cub and carp in waters further afield. Other people seem to like walking, (our area is very rural) and gardening is a popular leisure activity. A lot of people enjoy swimming and there is a swimming pool 4 miles away in Sleaford.There are several indoor hobbies which are poular , including knitting, sewing, winemaking and reading.Television and videos are also popular leisure activities. Many people use the village hall where clubs are organised including Bingo, Sports Club, coffee mornings and Disco's. Coach outings are also organised by local groups.
